tasks.task: Discuss best management practices for farmers under varying climate conditions.
subtasks: Explain the impact of El Nino and La Nina on planting decisions.
Address anticipated climate change effects on peanuts and suggest adaptation measures.
Emphasize the importance of water scheduling under hot and dry conditions.
Advise on preparing for aflatoxin growth in warmer, drier climates.

tasks.task: Highlight the role of crop rotation and planting time in insect management.
subtasks: Suggest practices to prevent insect pest buildup in peanuts through crop rotation.
